thread.title: Enlightened Awarded Contract To Provide Planning And Analysis Support For The US Department of State
thread.title_full: Enlightened Awarded Contract To Provide Planning And Analysis Support For The US Department of State

title: Enlightened Awarded Contract To Provide Planning And Analysis Support For The US Department of State
text:
Enlightened Awarded Contract To Provide Planning And Analysis Support For The US Department of State [October 07, 2015] Tweet 
WASHINGTON , Oct. 7, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Enlightened, Inc. ("Enlightened"), a leading provider of Information Technology (IT) consulting services announced today that it has been awarded a contract to provide planning and analysis support for the U.S. Department of State's Bureau of Diplomatic Security (DS). Enlightened, Inc., the HUBZone prime, teamed with its longstanding Contractor Teaming Partner (CTA) Booz Allen Hamilton, Inc. to provide technical and advisory services, management services, and program support staff services. 
The program focuses on three major tasks: planning and transition advisory support, strategic planning group assistance and policy and planning division support. The result of the program will provide performance management and continuous process improvements to DS Strategic Planning and Program Planning requirements. 
Mr. Timothy O'Brien , a 25-year veteran of the Department's Bureau of Diplomatic Security,is leading this program for Team Enlightened. The Bureau of Diplomatic Security is requesting support in identifying the most efficient means of transitioning all security training from 11 locations to one, ensuring the Bureau of Diplomatic Security has the proper workforce mix that corresponds to its work priorities, and reviewing Bureau programs in order to inform executive leadership on appropriate workforce and training priorities. Mr. O'Brien is experienced not only in the security training aspect of the requirement, but strategic planning and policy within the Bureau. 
"I am excited to serve DS and the Department on such a groundbreaking and dynamic project and look forward to leading Team Enlightened as we deliver on the project requirements," said Timothy O'Brien , Enlightened Program Manager. 
About Enlightened 
Enlightened is an award winning company that provides Cyber Security, IT and management solutions to resolve complex business problems for federal, state, and local government agencies. Enlightened holds GSA IT-70 and MOBIS schedule contracts, and is certified as a HUBZone and Small Business by the Small Business Administration. For more information please visit www.enlightened.com . To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/enlightened-awarded-contract-to-provide-planning-and-analysis-support-for-the-us-department-of-state-300155802.html 
SOURCE Enlightened, Inc.
